item.description:
Mostly Singles Enneagram Party

Come join a party with great people, time to meet people individually, group get together, learn some things about the Enneagram and your type, some optional games, great food. All for $10. Bring vegetarian entrees, appetizers, snacks or drinks as an option. Anyone is welcome. Most people are single who attend.

7:00 pm - 11:00 pm

Herb Pearce has been hosting Mostly Singles Parties for quite a while. He is a therapist, personal life coach and supports people to be creative in their lives. He works with clients as well as teaches workshops on personality conflict, self esteem issues and developing spirituality. He is the author of The Idiot's Guide to the Enneagram

781 648 3737
herb@herbpearce.com
www.herbpearce.com for a complete list of events
item.name: Mostly Singles Enneagram Party
